group05pkg 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to group05pkg

    Split the dataset into training and testing sets based on a strata variable

    split_dataset.Rd

    Splits the data into testing/training and ensures variables are appropriate for classification algorithm

    split_dataset(data_set, strata_variable, predictor)

    Arguments

    data_set

    the data set to be used for the algorithm

    strata_variable

    a string representing the variable that will be set as the strata in initial_split

    predictor

    a string representing the variable to be used as the predictor for the algorithm

    Value

    a list containing the training and the testing data sets

    Examples

    data_set <- data.frame(
x = rnorm(100),
y = sample(c("A", "B", "C"), 100, replace = TRUE),
z = rnorm(100)
)
strata_variable <- "y"
predictor <- "x"

split_dataset(data_set, strata_variable, predictor)
